column4: so everything I'm reading seems to indicate something 32bit is freaking out because this is a 64 bit library
but that doesnt make sense because I installed a 64bit version of the OS, and am jsut running apt-get update
not all apps are ported to 64 bit yet; some (like wine) only run as 32 bit.
any suggestions why running an apt-get dist-upgrade would cause my install to become unbootable because of a shared library?
